channel.title: Need help with my server
channel.description:
Someone said i need to change something from private to public but i have no idea what lol.
[code]RSApplet.java:218: error: x is not public in Component; cannot be accessed from outside package mouseWheelX = x; ^ RSApplet.java:219: error: y is not public in Component; cannot be accessed from outside package mouseWheelY = y; ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @shadow9903 shadow9903
item.description:
@shadow9903 wrote:

If i was taking an educated guess I am web developer not that experienced in java but I believe you have to declare the variable before you use it, who ever told you that didn’t really look as the variables are not even private, look on line 246 and 247 and try putting it before the if statement but don’t hate me if i’m wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @Soulxs Soulxs
item.description:
@Soulxs wrote:

In RsApplet.java (This is client sided by the way, not server sided). Line 218 & 219
That’s what the error says, although i’m not experienced enough to know what else could be wrong if that isn’t it so don’t hold me onto it

Read full topic
